mapper.select: select sku.id,sku.skuName,sku.price,sku.image from t_sku sku left join t_spu spu on sku.spuId = spu.id where spu.isUp = '2' and spu.isNew = '2' and spu.isRec='2'
select sku.id,sku.skuName,sku.price,sku.stock,spu.brandName,spu.cateName from t_sku sku left join t_spu spu on sku.spuId = spu.id where sku.stock <10
